Stored Data Files¶

The get_census package contains stored data frames listing all state and county FIPS codes, primarily for internal use. To access these data frames you can use the following functions

get_census.data.load_data.load_county_codes()[source]¶

Read in data file listing all counties in the US, with their state and county FIPS codes

Returns

pandas data frame

get_census.data.load_data.load_state_codes()[source]¶

Read in data file listing all states in the US, with their FIPS codes

Returns

pandas data frame

get_census
